title: The OSM Helm chart values schema

enable.title: Autoscale enable
enable.description: Indicates whether autoscale should be enabled or not.

minReplicas.title: Autoscale minimum replicas
minReplicas.description: Indicates the minimum replicas for autoscale.

maxReplicas.title: Autoscale maximum replicase
maxReplicas.description: Indicates the maximum replicas for autoscale.

targetAverageUtilization.title: Autoscale targetAverageUtilization
targetAverageUtilization.description: Indicates average target CPU utilization (percentage) for autoscale.

OpenServiceMesh.title: The OpenServiceMesh schema
OpenServiceMesh.description: The top level required key in the values file.

replicaCount.title: The replicaCount schema
replicaCount.description: The number of replicas of the osm-controller pod

enablePodDisruptionBudget.title: The enablePodDisruptionBudget schema
enablePodDisruptionBudget.description: Indicates whether Pod Disruption Budget should be enabled or not.

image.title: The image schema
image.description: The details of the images to run.

registry.title: The registry schema
registry.description: The registry of the images to run.

sidecarImage.title: The sidecarImage schema
sidecarImage.description: The proxy side car image to run.

kind.title: The certificate provider kind schema
kind.description: The certificate manager osm-controller should use.

certKeyBitSize.title: The certKeyBitSize schema
certKeyBitSize.description: The key size for data plane certificates.

caBundleSecretName.title: The caBundleSecretName schema
caBundleSecretName.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

enableDebugServer.title: The enableDebugServer schema
enableDebugServer.description: Indicates whether the Debug Server should be enabled or not.

enablePermissiveTrafficPolicy.title: The enablePermissiveTrafficPolicy schema
enablePermissiveTrafficPolicy.description: Indicates whether permissive traffic policy should be enabled or not.

enableEgress.title: The enableEgress schema
enableEgress.description: Indicates whether egress should be enabled or not.

deployPrometheus.title: The deployPrometheus schema
deployPrometheus.description: Indicates whether Prometheus should be installed and configured as part of the osm control plane.

deployGrafana.title: The deployGrafana schema
deployGrafana.description: Indicates whether Grafana should be installed and configured as part of the osm control plane.

enableFluentbit.title: The enableFluentbit schema
enableFluentbit.description: Indicates whether Fluent Bit log forwarding should be enabled

fluentBit.title: The Fluent Bit schema
fluentBit.description: The default details of the Fluent Bit sidecar if enabled.

name.title: The name schema
name.description: The name of the Fluent Bit container

registry.title: The registry schema
registry.description: The registry of the image to run.

outputPlugin.title: The output plugin for Fluent Bit
outputPlugin.description: The log forwarding destination plugin for Fluent Bit

workspaceId.title: The Fluent Bit workspaceId schema
workspaceId.description: The workspace ID for Fluent Bit output plugin to Log Analytics

primaryKey.title: The Fluent Bit primaryKey schema
primaryKey.description: The primary key for Fluent Bit output plugin to Log Analytics

enableProxySupport.title: The enableProxySupport output schema
enableProxySupport.description: Indicates whether outbound proxy support should be configured for Fluent Bit

meshName.title: The meshName schema
meshName.description: The name associated with the control plane being installed.

useHTTPSIngress.title: The useHTTPSIngress schema
useHTTPSIngress.description: Indicates whether HTTPS Ingress should be enabled or not.

maxDataPlaneConnections.title: The maxDataPlaneConnections schema
maxDataPlaneConnections.description: Sets the Max Data Plane Connections

configResyncInterval.title: The configResyncInterval schema
configResyncInterval.description: Sets the resync interval for regular proxy broadcast updates

enforceSingleMesh.title: The enforceSingleMesh schema
enforceSingleMesh.description: Enforce only running a single control plane within a cluster.

deployJaeger.title: The deployJaeger schema
deployJaeger.description: Indicates whether Jaeger should be installed and configured as part of the control plane.

tracing.title: The tracing schema
tracing.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

enable.title: The enable schema for tracing
enable.description: Indicates whether tracing is enabled or not

webhookConfigNamePrefix.title: Webhook Config Name Prefix
webhookConfigNamePrefix.description: Prefix for the webhook name, which uses the format <webhook-prefix>-<mesh-name>

osmNamespace.title: The namespace of the OSM control plane components
osmNamespace.description: Indicates the namespace in which the OSM control plane components will be installed

enablePrivilegedInitContainer.title: The enablePrivilegedInitContainer schema
enablePrivilegedInitContainer.description: Indicates whether the init container for pods in the mesh should be privileged

replicaCount.title: The replicaCount schema
replicaCount.description: The number of replicas of the osm-injector pod.

enablePodDisruptionBudget.title: The enablePodDisruptionBudget schema
enablePodDisruptionBudget.description: Indicates whether Pod Disruption Budget should be enabled or not.

webhookTimeoutSeconds.title: Webhook Timeout Seconds
webhookTimeoutSeconds.description: Timeout for the mutating webhook in seconds

replicaCount.title: The replicaCount schema
replicaCount.description: The number of replicas of the CRD converter pod.

podLabels.title: The podLabels schema
podLabels.description: Labels for the CRD converter pod.

enableWASMStats.title: Enable WASM stats
enableWASMStats.description: Enable extra Envoy statistics generated by a custom WASM extension

enableEgressPolicy.title: Enable OSM's Egress policy
enableEgressPolicy.description: Enable OSM's Egress policy for fine grained control over egress (external) traffic

enableOSMGateway.title: Enable OSM gateway
enableOSMGateway.description: Enable OSM gateway for ingress or multicluster

enableCRDConverter.title: Enable CRD Conversion Webhook
enableCRDConverter.description: Enable CRD Conversion Webhook in OSM

enableIngressBackendPolicy.title: Enable OSM to use the IngressBackend API
enableIngressBackendPolicy.description: Enable OSM to use the IngressBackend API for allowing ingress to mesh backends

pspEnabled.title: The pspEnabled schema
pspEnabled.description: Indicates whether OSM should run with PodSecurityPolicies

controlPlaneTolerations.title: The controlPlaneTolerations schema
controlPlaneTolerations.description: Node tolerations applied to control plane pods to schedule onto nodes with matching taints

outboundIPRangeExclusionList.title: The outboundIPRangeExclusionList schema
outboundIPRangeExclusionList.description: Outbound IP range exluclusion list for sidecar traffic interception

outboundPortExclusionList.title: The outboundPortExclusionList schema
outboundPortExclusionList.description: Outbound port exluclusion list for sidecar traffic interception

inboundPortExclusionList.title: The inboundPortExclusionList schema
inboundPortExclusionList.description: Inbound port exluclusion list for sidecar traffic interception

enableRemoteRendering.title: Grafana's enableRemoteRendering schema
enableRemoteRendering.description: Enable remote rendering of Grafana's dashboards

host.title: Hashicorp Vault's host schema
host.description: Hashicorp Vault host/service - where Vault is installed

protocol.title: Hashicorp Vault's protocol schema
protocol.description: Protocol to use to connect to Vault

token.title: Hashicorp Vault's token schema
token.description: Token to use to connect to Vault

imagePullSecrets.title: The imagePullSecrets schema
imagePullSecrets.description: ImagePullSecrets for the control plane pod
